definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: only Pu. cut in, carve (NH represent, imitate; ‖[[חקק]])—

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְחֻקֶּה]] 1Ki 6:35, Ez Eze 8:10 + Eze 23:14 (Co [[מְחֻקִּים]], after LXX SyrVer Targum Vulgate), carved figure on wall Ez Eze 8:10, Eze 23:14 (where rd. [[אנשׁים מחקים]], v. supr.) = subst. carved work 1Ki 6:35 (on doors of temple).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[על־שָׁרְשֵׁי רַגְלַי תִּתְחַקֶּה]] Job 13:27 thou gravest thee a graving (= markest a line) for (i.e. about) the soles of my feet, fixest limits for them (v. Di).
